author: Perez Hilton
title: Pitbull & J Balvin Drop A Banger With Camila Cabello For The Fate Of The Furious Soundtrack! Listen HERE!
text:
A Slimmed Down Mama June Is UNRECOGNIZABLE In Sneak Peek Of Her New Show 
Mama June is back! 
The reality star revealed her drastically slimmer figure in a new preview clip from her show Mama June: From Not to Hot . 
In the clip, the 37-year-old catches up with her daughter Alana Thompson (the artist formerly known as Honey Boo Boo ) and receives some very dramatic news! 
The 11-year-old tells June she got a phone call from her dad's new fianc√©e Jennifer , who wanted to take the beauty pageant veteran shopping "to pick out some flower girl dresses" for their upcoming wedding. 
Related: Honey Boo Boo Promotes Her Mom's New Show In New York 
Unsurprisingly, Mama is NOT pleased over the news -- especially when Alana asks if she join the already awkward shopping excursion with Sugar Bear 's new lady! 
We don't feel too bad for Mama June though, as she drops from 460 pounds to a size 4 over the course of the series -- and looks damn good in that black track suit! 
Ch-ch-check out the clip (below) to see her significantly slimmer look!
